404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is temporarily unable to handle your request due to maintenance or capacity issues.

default.title: An Error Occurred
default.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page or contact support if the problem persists.
